Package zen

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AutoPlayer
    This class allows to create an automatic player
    Game
    This class allows to instantiate a zen game loop
    HumanPlayer
    This class allows to create a human player
    Pawn
    This class allows to create the pawns of a player
    Player
    This class allows to create a player in the current game and allow it to make action
    SaveManager
    This class allows to save or load a zen game
    Square
    This class allows to create all the squares of the grid of the zen game
    Zen
    This class allows to create a new zen game with the mode that the user have choose (console or graphical)
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    PawnType
    This class allows to declare the type of the pawn to find out wich player it belongs to
